TopicTitle: Help! my old Mk3 parts have vanished! (someone still in .25 please fix my craft)

Articles.Content:
Can someone who has not yet updated their KSP to .90.0 please download this vessel, pull the 2m bicoupler off the Mk3 adapter, pull the old (recently removed) Mk3-Mk2 adapter off the vessel, and reattach the bicoupler? Then reupload it?

https://www.dropbox.com/s/kie35rff4rppf2o/Gryphon%20v5.craft?dl=0

Edited December 16, 2014 by Rakaydos
...and now I'm wondering if the mod even read the post before moving it here...

Sorry about all the moving, it's a hectic time with the update.

Moved to Gameplay Questions and Tutorials, because that's probably what fits this thread the closest.
Edited the title to be a bit more clear.
I could do this when I get off work in an hour. Unless someone else already has.
Here ya go. Nice looking plane!

Thanks. It was my FAR Crew Rotation and Resupply craft for LKO, and it flew (in FAR) like a dream.

Looking to adapt it for a Mk3 core hull.
